entry.title: Hello World!
entry.summary: Hello and welcome to my new Docusaurus Demo site - a sandbox for exploring features of this platform and creating a static website+blog template that I can use for various projects!
entry.content:
Hello and welcome to my new Docusaurus Demo site - a sandbox for exploring features of this platform and creating a static website+blog template that I can use for various projects!

You can also check out my visual storytelling adventures on my SketchTheDocs.Dev website - or by following @sketchthedocs on Twitter.

Let's Go Docu-venturing!
